metadata.name: Potential Binary Proxy Execution Via Cdb.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "cdb.exe" to launch arbitrary processes or commands from a debugger script file

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cdb.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cdb.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -cf '))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "cdb.exe" to launch arbitrary processes or commands from a debugger script file

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of debugging tools References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Cdb/, https://web.archive.org/web/20170715043507/http://www.exploit-monday.com/2016/08/windbg-cdb-shellcode-runner.html, https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1534957360032120833
